channel.title: Client Issue (d/c me when bringing up a window)
channel.description:
Ok this is my problem....
Whenever I do something that brings up a window... Let's say opening up a shop it will d/c me for some reason also if I do the ::char command or the ::bank command it will d/c like it isn't even suppose to be in it... I need help with this quick
[b]Someone said it was due to the wrong Client Interfaces and they need to be changed but how do I do that? Can anyone help? I USING GALKONSBASE[/b]
Thanks if you help!!!
If you need more info just post below and Ill put more detail into my problem :)

item.title: Client Issue (d/c me when bringing up a window)
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
